introduction.title: Pueblo San Vicente
introduction.subtitle: Maldonado, Uruguay.
introduction.description:
The house is Nordic-style. It is located in Pueblo San Vicente, between La Barra and José Ignacio, between the countryside and the ocean. 8 minutes from the beaches of Manantiales and José Ignacio.

It has 150 square meters, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a toilet. Kitchen integrated with the living room.

It was designed to be integrated with its green spaces and maximize contact with nature.
The front and back open completely, leaving a free space between both gardens.
introduction.mapCaption: An 8 min drive from José Ignacio and 8 minutes from Manantiales

connect.title: Connect
connect.subtitle: For availability and bookings, reach out to us:

fauna.title: Fauna
fauna.description1: Living in the countryside means sharing space with nature.
fauna.description2: It is common for a black cat to visit the house as well as the occasional bird that takes advantage of the open windows to peek inside.

flora.title: Flora
flora.description: The garden is self-sufficient and receives weekly maintenance from Christian, the gardener.

audio.title: Audio System
audio.description:
The house has a Sonos system that works with AirPlay. When connected to WiFi, you can select "Living Room" to use them.
In the main bedroom there is another AirPlay speaker called "Libratone."

extractor.title: Extractor Fan
extractor.description: It activates automatically when pulling the tray outward and turns off when pushing it back.

oven.title: Oven
oven.description: The function used 99% of the time is the one marked in the image below. Fan with temperature.

washer.title: Washing Machine
washer.description: The most practical function is the "Quick" 30-minute with spinning at 1200 rpm.

dryer.title: Dryer
dryer.description: The most convenient option is the first one clockwise: "Extra dry, ready to store."
